con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.getResponseContent()
log.info responseContent
def slurper = new JsonSlurper() def json = slurper.parseText responseContent
log.info json.data.dropLocation.id
assert json.data.dropLocation.id==52
assert json.data.pickUpLocation.id==53

con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.getResponseContent()
log.info responseContent
def slurper = new JsonSlurper() def json = slurper.parseText responseContent
assert json.data.title=="abc"
log.info json.data.extranetID
assert json.data.extranetID.equals("2c92808558518bfc0158518c36400002")
